topic: How to containerize stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to containerize stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Containerizing Stream Processing with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to containerize a stream processing application using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+. We will utilize Docker for containerization and Uvicorn as the ASGI server for running our FastAPI app.
key_points: Setting up a FastAPI application for stream processing
Containerizing the FastAPI application with Docker
Running the containerized application using Uvicorn
Exploring asynchronous handling of streaming data in FastAPI

code_examples.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI
app = FastAPI()
@app.post('/stream')
async def stream(data: AsyncIterable[str]):
    # process the streaming data here...

caveats: Ensure your Python environment is compatible with the specified versions.
Modify the Dockerfile to fit your specific project requirements.
